phrs.translation: 液压油量, 公升, 容积, 垃圾桶容积

sentences.sentence: The answer is 2200 liters of barley, 526 of olives, 468 of wine--I hope you remember all this.
sentences.translation: 答案是两千二百升大麦、五百二十六个橄榄、四百六十八桶酒——我希望你们全能记住。

sentences.sentence: Part of a healthy diet is drinking at least 2 liters of pure (ideally alkaline) mineral water every day.
sentences.translation: 健康膳食的其中一个组成部分是每天至少喝2升纯净（最好为碱性的）矿泉水。

sentences.sentence: People in many countries use kilograms, centimeters, square meters, liters, and Celsius. These are all ways to measure things.
sentences.translation: 许多国家的人使用公斤、厘米、平方米、升和摄氏。这些都是测量事物的方法。
